availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward "Ed" D. Satterfield (Caldwell co, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy McCarty Satterfield in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on October 14, 1826. Father of Mildred Satterfield, Eliza A. Satterfield, and James F. Satterfield. Resident in Caldwell County in 1840. Owned five enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1840. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Employed Henry Lewis as a farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Died in Caldwell County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, p. 4.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 388B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 51.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 206.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administration Bonds, 1863-1878 p. 85.
